schema.name: Orders
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE Orders ( OrderID int, OrderDate varchar(255), OrderAmount int, OrderStatus int, CreatedAt datetime NOT NULL, CustomerID int );

query.name: getOrdersByCustomerID
query.sql: SELECT Orders.OrderID, Customers.CustomerName, Orders.OrderDate FROM Orders INNER JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID=Customers.CustomerID WHERE `Orders`.`CustomerID` = ?;

mutation.name: UpdateOrder
